amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from purchasing electric vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
